channel.title: Making, looking, and killing with
channel.description: I wanted to make an item, create NPC's and make them look like i designed them. And i was just wondering....how do you do that? miss silab made a halo version server with energy swords i want to make halo guns :P and make people look like master chief(his armor). i want to know what kind of software I would need? if anyone knows the software to make and create your own item's please post.

item.title: Making, looking, and killing with
item.dc:creator: @soul_extange soul extange
item.description:
@soul_extange wrote:

I wanted to make an item, create NPC’s and make them look like i designed them.
And i was just wondering…how do you do that?
miss silab made a halo version server with energy swords i want to make halo guns
and make people look like master chief(his armor).
i want to know what kind of software I would need?
if anyone knows the software to make and create your own item’s please post.
